name: Ondas Holdings Inc.
description: Ondas Holdings Inc. is a leading provider of private wireless data networks and advanced communications solutions for critical infrastructure markets. Founded in 2015, the company specializes in developing and deploying proprietary software and hardware technologies designed to enhance connectivity and operational efficiency across various industries. Ondas is particularly focused on sectors such as transportation, utility, and industrial markets, helping organizations to modernize their communications infrastructure with reliable and secure private networks. Its flagship product, the Ondas Networks platform, leverages advanced technologies like Software-Defined Networking (SDN) and cloud-based solutions to provide scalable and customizable networking options. Ondas is committed to creating innovative solutions that empower customers to improve their operational capabilities while ensuring data security and regulatory compliance. The company operates on the principle that seamless communication is essential for the success of critical operations, and it strives to deliver high-performance network solutions that meet the evolving needs of its clients. Through strategic partnerships and a focus on research and development, Ondas aims to lead the digital transformation in its target industries, driving efficiency and enhancing safety through improved connectivity.
